resources.string: This is the main screen of the app, you can click the icons to go to the other activities.

This is the files screen of the app, you should be able to view a file tree of your phone and find some music to play with the app. It also will link back to the main activity and to the now playing activity. Would have to query the phone for each audio file on it, and display a sorted list of the files.

This is the search screen of the app, you should be able to search quickly for files on your phone to play with the app. It also will link back to the main activity and to the now playing activity. Would have to query the phone for each audio file on it, and display a list of files with the search term in them.
This is the about screen of the app, it should contain information about the app such as website, licenses, etc. It also will link back to the main activity and to the now playing activity.

This is the now playing screen of the app, it should have controls for playing the current file and also album art and things of that nature. It will also link back to the main activity. Uses MediaPlayer to play the audio?
